dataset_id: MODIS/Terra Surface Reflectance Quality Daily L2G Global 1km SIN Grid
title: MODIS/Terra Surface Reflectance Quality Daily L2G Global 1km SIN Grid
summary: The MODIS Near Real Time (NRT) level-2G 1km surface reflectance data state QA product MOD09GST, is a restructured version of its primary input, the state QA data in MOD09_L2. This product summarizes the quality of the MOD09 products, specifically atmospheric and other correction states. The product contains quality assurance data pertaining to cloud and  cloud shadow, land and water designations, aerosols, and the data source of corrections performed on the file. The data set also contains the number of  observations for each pixel.
